column1: #escooter description - a descriptive reference for the escooter e.g. ePT050
#actual battery capacity - the percentage with no decimal places of the battery capacity e.g. 75 for a battery with 0.75kWh charge. For non electrical vehicles

column2: order this by descending time to finish charge in seconds and secondly by ascending escooter description.

column1: escooter description;actual battery capacity;time to finish charge in seconds
